msg_export_info: After importing the exported workflow, the referenced knowledge bases and databases will be automatically created. Please confirm whether to export the knowledge base content and database content simultaneously.
msg_library_warning: The exported workflow will include referenced knowledge bases. Checking this option will also export knowledge base content. Please note enterprise content usage and ensure data security.
msg_database_warning: The exported workflow will include referenced databases. Checking this option will also export database content. Please note enterprise content usage and ensure data security.
